title: (x) Square slab in They Might Be Giants "Ana Ng." ad - CG Geometric {Stephen}
content:
Can anyone identify the font used in this (1988) advert?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424143302im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Anangadvert_4516.jpg)
author: tartarus

comments.content:
Stephen Coles: Thanks.

marcox: Yeah, it's my favorite song of theirs.
Tartarus: If you haven't already, check out their newest, "The Else." I quit paying attention to TMBG for a while, but this release reignited my interest. It's pretty strong start to finish.
